item.title: Nora add a quote by Laurell K. Hamilton
item.description: "Friends don't count the cost of favors." -- Laurell K. Hamilton

item.title: Nora add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Nora add a quote by Marion Zimmer Bradley
item.description: "There is no such thing as a true tale. Truth has many faces and the truth is like to the old road to Avalon; it depends on your own will, and your own thoughts, whither the road will take you." -- Marion Zimmer Bradley

item.title: Nora add a quote by Laurell K. Hamilton
item.description: "one of the good things about being a woman is that my level of testosterone poisoning is lower than most men's." -- Laurell K. Hamilton

item.title: Nora add a quote by Laurell K. Hamilton
item.description: "Maybe they know what I know, that the true way to a man's heart is six inches of metal between his ribs. Sometimes four inches will do the job, but to be really sure, I like to have six." -- Laurell K. Hamilton

item.title: Nora add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Nora add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Nora add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "The truth." Dumbledore sighed. "It is a beautiful and terrible thing, and should therefore be treated with great caution." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Nora add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Nora add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is my belief... that the truth is generally preferable to lies." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Nora add a quote by Laurell K. Hamilton
item.description: "Surely being in love doesn't cause you to lose your sense of good taste. If I ever buy a gown with sequins on it, someone just shoot me. " -- Laurell K. Hamilton

item.title: Nora add a quote by Jacqueline Carey
item.description: "All paths are present, always... and we can but choose among them." -- Jacqueline Carey

item.title: Nora add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "If you are a dreamer come in If you are a dreamer a wisher a liar A hoper a pray-er a magic-bean-buyer If youre a pretender com sit by my fire For we have some flax golden tales to spin Come in! Come in!" -- Shel Silverstein
